## TransactionObject type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type TransactionObject = {
    hash: TxHash;
    nonce: number;
    blockHash: TxHash;
    blockNumber: number;
    transactionIndex: number;
    from: Address;
    to: Address | null;
    value: BigNumber;
    gasPrice: BigNumber;
    gas: Quantity;
    input: Data;
    v?: Data;
    r?: Data;
    s?: Data;
};
```
